subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: LeBron James’s reverse layup with less than a second left Wednesday night gave Cleveland an 84-83 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers, the Cavaliers’ fifth straight road victory.
snippet: LeBron James’s reverse layup with less than a second left Wednesday night gave Cleveland an 84-83 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers, the Cavaliers’ fifth straight road victory.
